name: Week 2 - Thirst Trap
description:
You are an impulsive vampire that runs a nightclub.

Earn higher tips by serving customers quickly, however, the higher your thirst bar the worse your customer service gets! (Low Wait Time & Thirst Bar = High Tips!)

Earn as many tips as you can to maximise your profits by Closing Time

(Game Over at 03:00 AM)

Controls:

Mouse - Look Around/ Select Target

When a target is selected:

Left Click - Serve Customer (if behind the bar)

Right Click - Suck Blood

W,A,S,D - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Sprint
